<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Invert the specified predicate.  != -&gt; ==, &lt; -&gt; &gt;=.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a975319b2f772b89387ffea1b1ba1f049"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a14028f7fe73a11dabc6583510cc0a355">Predicate</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a975319b2f772b89387ffea1b1ba1f049">InvertPredicate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a14028f7fe73a11dabc6583510cc0a355">Predicate</a> Opcode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Assume the condition register is set by MI(a,b), return the predicate if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// we modify the instructions such that condition register is set by MI(b,a).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a12c2165ec169065a665bc3a9fcacea89"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a14028f7fe73a11dabc6583510cc0a355">Predicate</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a12c2165ec169065a665bc3a9fcacea89">getSwappedPredicate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a14028f7fe73a11dabc6583510cc0a355">Predicate</a> Opcode);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the condition without hint bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a2624042e885fc1d665e8fc01a0ab390b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a2624042e885fc1d665e8fc01a0ab390b">getPredicateCondition</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a14028f7fe73a11dabc6583510cc0a355">Predicate</a> Opcode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)(Opcode &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a8144d2e1978b3e3a226233c0b93b92f4a5df95ff204e7992373cbe6b8ab6b1e79">~BR&#95;HINT&#95;MASK</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the hint bits of the predicate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a5f7348f565ebb68dc08979b2808300c5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a5f7348f565ebb68dc08979b2808300c5">getPredicateHint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a14028f7fe73a11dabc6583510cc0a355">Predicate</a> Opcode) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return predicate consisting of specified condition and hint bits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
